product.longDescription: A softneck variety hardy enough to overwinter in the North. Heads produce an impressive 8–15 (or more) light purple-skinned cloves each. Renowned for mild flavor. An easy choice for southern growers. Exceptionally long storage when properly cured. NOTE: Not as cold hardy as our stiffneck/hardneck varieties. USDA Certified Organic.
product.shortDescription: Best variety for making garlic braids.

Inchelium Red Organic Garlic Bulbs

Product ID:4086G.364086G

A softneck variety hardy enough to overwinter in the North. Heads produce an impressive 8–15 (or more) light purple-skinned cloves each. Renowned for mild flavor. An easy choice for southern growers. Exceptionally long storage when properly cured. NOTE: Not as cold hardy as our stiffneck/hardneck varieties. USDA Certified Organic.
